siccom.sim

Class Temperature

  • java.lang.Object
    • siccom.sim.Temperature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class Temperature
extends java.lang.Object
implements sim.engine.Steppable
    This class handles the temperature data The different years of the data set are accessed randomly and the one extreme year (1998) is accessed when the bleaching interval is reached
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Andreas Kubicek
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
